text: Eenam Thettaatha Kaattaaru is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. Vinod Kumar, starring Sukumaran and Jayalalita in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Sukumaran as Jayan * Jayalalita as Neeli * Cochin Haneefa as George * Viji as Ponni * Veena Sunder * Ganesh Kumar as Rajesh * Shanawas as Maruthan *Hari as Kattumooppan *Radha Devi ==Soundtrack http://www.malayalasangeetham.info/m.php?2920== Music was by Navas Rahman, with lyrics by Poovachal Khader. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! Yesudas, || Poovachal Khader || Navas Rahman |- | 3 || "Thaipongal" || K. S. Chitra || Poovachal Khader || Navas Rahman |} ==References== ==External links== * ==see the movie== * Eenam Thettatha Kattaru 1989 Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Eenam Thettatha Kattaru
